bow: what wish someone would have told me before had kids that you will never be able to sit and enjoy meal again you re pretty much just shoveling your food down as fast as you can before one of your kids needs diaper changed or snack who else misses eating and enjoying an actual meal also being able to eat hot meal while it still hot is luxury never knew had until lost it do too im usually trying to eat while also trying to convince her to eat even little of what ve made but what truly miss the most being able to use the restroom by myself without having toddler burst through the door and ask me what doing lol lol lukewarm food forever same officially underweight and malnourished 15 months later sounds like great problem but assure you it just as hopeless as being overweight which was at the beginning although do look alright in clothes so have that going for me guess oh yeah going to the bathroom and hear the pitter patter of little hands on the hardwood and then second later big smiling face peers around the door and crawls in then she stands up and asks to be held😂 we re in the beginning stages of potty training here so anytime go to the bathroom she has to be with me and asking to help how she expects to help have no idea when finished usually have my own personal cheerleader yay momma you went on the potty good job oh man that rich kids really are marvel aren they they are she natural chatter box so some of the stuff this kid comes out with dying over it only for the first little bit ehhh not necessarily my toddler still doesn have enough patience for being trapped in high chair just finally getting to eat quickly from wolf down dinner so fast you can taste it at 16 months old or never having anything for yourself again it seems like as soon as think about snack have hungry pleading eyes staring me down even if they were just fed omfg im so glad you said that literally stuffing my mouth in matter of seconds it is until you are mother that you truly understand why mama bear porridge was always too cold even just microwaving meal is luxury ve found the best way to get hot food is to graze as cook do get to sit down to enjoy the meal but at least it hot lol also cut my food up like do the kids food so that can easily eat handed when any crisis arises heck still wishing could finish cup of coffee never mind whole meal truth will be standing in the kitchen hiding eating all the good food that you don want your kid to see recently saw something that said you know you re mom when your finally understand why mama bear porridge was too cold today shoved some cold tempura in my mouth and my sushi is over there now probably completely room temperature none of my food will ever be the right temperature again used to be underweight too know the struggle hope never go back to that hope you start feeling better and keeping weight on again soon sure that is little exhausting but it also very sweet memory good job love it think it was around when we were all able to sit and eat at the same time we usually fed the kids first while we prepared our stuff so that either hubs or would be able to eat in peace moved to using one of those yeti style cups for coffee never gets cold while the kids run circles around you that was honestly one of my favorite times amidst the ridiculousness of dealing with toddler the little cheerleaders were awesome lol ve started getting everyone plates ready and have them on the table cooling off and ll eat really fast before tell anyone that dinner is ready by three time done shoveling it in the kids plates are cool and in much better mental state after eating hahaha it feels like that now but believe me it goes by so fast next time you turn around they are 15 and shaving my husband asked why stand to eat breakfast in the morning so sat at the table and was immediately climbed on by both children he doesn ask dumb questions anymore lol whoa think this just triggered an existential crisis crazy dude when they were brand new my husband and would scarf it down like we had eaten in years these days just wish could have hot fresh cup of coffee ve gotten used to not eating oh it is she can definitely be exhausting but she so damn funny and sweet she is too funny and such little parrot lol she also super sweet for her age we lost close friend of the family today and while my mom was upset she went in and asked if she was okay then offered her her absolute favorite blanky to feel better melted my heart ❤️ eat so fast now like it competition like someone is coming to steal my food they are don even taste anymore hot coffee would be heaven yep my partner and were having this conversation the other day every meal is wolfed down without even really chewing or tasting it even if we go to our favourite little cafe around the corner we re in and out within 30 minutes eating is perfunctory opportunistic task when you have small child it like that line from christmas story my mother had not had hot meal for herself in fifteen years totally feel this weigh less now than did before fell pregnant can see my sternum bones and ribcage but then have soft loose skin on my tummy so just look really weird giving you hugs xx how about drinking hot coffee cold beer is this why moms drink red wine oh ok removed you will never have clean eyeglasses again my kids constantly touch my glasses they are always smudged and greasy have to wear my contacts so can see removed my baby just turned week today and just made my husband go eat something so when my lo wakes up he can watch him while eat let the fun begin eat most meals standing up at the kitchen counter few weeks back my husband decided to take work from home day and brought me coffee while was feeding the baby took sip and was shocked that it was hot guess got used to drinking room temp coffee and had even noticed until my husband got me fresh cup it not weird that skin on your tummy let people know you re mummy gave up coffee about year ago what the point would get around to drinking it til about 1pm sleep better now meal sure but mostly miss sleep and sex also even if they are eating the exact same thing my toddler will literally have exactly what have on her plate in front of her but will insist on eating mine instead it must taste better when it comes from mom plate reasons will never give up my lunch break at work my son is on this great new diet it called only get to eat half of my meal used to fantasise about eating an actual meal in real restaurant without kids menu with my ex joke was on me he went and did all that with the ow while was at home with the kids but in the end it got better he left am now single mum but make damned sure to take time out when need it and
